Ancestry categories

ancestry_categories.Rd

A dataset containing the ancestry categories defined in NHGRI-EBI GWAS Catalog framework (Table 1, Morales et al. (2018)). Ancestry categories are assigned to samples with distinct and well-defined patterns of genetic variation. You will find these categories in the variable ancestry of the following objects: scores, performance_metrics and sample_sets.

ancestry_categories

Format

A data frame with 17 rows and 3 columns:

ancestry

Ancestry category.

definition

Description of the ancestry category.

examples

Examples of detailed descriptions for samples included in the category.

Source

https://genomebiology.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s13059-018-1396-2/tables/1

Examples

ancestry_categories

#> # A tibble: 17 x 3

#> 11 Not reported                "Includes individuals for which… NA

#> 13 Other                       "Includes individuals where an … Surinamese, Rus…
